languages.text: {n}Эвейн подходит к телу своего друга и молчит какое-то время. Затем оглядывает карьер. Взгляд его темен.{/n} "Здесь все надо предать очистительному огню. Ан... что же ты наделал..."
{n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эвейн подходит к телу своего друга и молчит какое-то время. Затем оглядывает карьер. Взгляд его темен.{/n} "Здесь все надо предать очистительному огню. Ан... что же ты наделал..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friends and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"
{n}Evayne approaches the body of his friends and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

{n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"
{n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

languages.text: {n}艾维尼走近他朋友的尸体，沉默良久，之后看着采石场。他的目光黯淡无光。{/n}“这里的一切都必须在烈焰中净化。安……你都做了什么啊？”
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼走近他朋友的尸体，沉默良久，之后看着采石场。他的目光黯淡无光。{/n}“这里的一切都必须在烈焰中净化。安……你都做了什么啊？”

languages.text: {n}エヴァインは友人の遺体に近づき、しばらく沈黙する。そして、彼は採石場を見た。その視線は暗い。{/n}「ここにあるものはすべて火で浄化されねばならない。アン…お前は何ってことを？」
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインは仲間の遺体に近づき、しばらくのあいだ黙りこくった。それから彼は採石場を見た。しかし、その目は暗かった。{/n}「ここにあるものはすべて火で浄化されねばならない。アン…お前は何をしたんだ？」
{n}エヴァインは友人の遺体に近づき、しばらく沈黙する。そして、彼は採石場を見た。その視線は暗い。{/n}「ここにあるものはすべて火で浄化されねばならない。アン…お前は何ってことを？」

languages.text: {n}Evayne nähert sich der Leiche seines Freundes und verharrt eine Weile schweigend. Dann betrachtet er den Steinbruch. Sein Blick ist finster.{/n} "Alles hier muss mit Feuer gereinigt werden. An ... was habt Ihr getan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne nähert sich der Leiche seines Freundes und verharrt eine Weile schweigend. Dann betrachtet er den Steinbruch. Sein Blick ist finster.{/n} "Alles hier muss mit Feuer gereinigt werden. An ... was habt Ihr getan?"

languages.text: {n}Evayne s'approche du corps de son ami et garde le silence un moment. Puis il regarde la carrière. Son regard est sombre.{/n} « Tout ici doit être purgé par le feu. An... Qu'as-tu fait ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne s'approche du corps de son ami et garde le silence un moment. Puis il regarde la carrière. Son regard est sombre.{/n} « Tout ici doit être purgé par le feu. An... Qu'as-tu fait ? »

languages.text: {n}Evayne se acerca al cadáver de su amigo y guarda silencio. Después mira la cantera sombríamente.{/n} «Es necesario purgar el lugar con fuego. An... ¿qué has hecho?».
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne se acerca al cadáver de su amigo y guarda silencio. Después mira la cantera sombríamente.{/n} «Es necesario purgar el lugar con fuego. An... ¿qué has hecho?».

languages.text: {n}Evayne, arkadaşının cesedine yaklaşıp bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra karanlık gözlerle ocağa bakıyor.{/n} "Buradaki her şey, ateşle paklanmalı. An... Sen ne yaptın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne approaches the body of his friend and remains silent for some time. Then he looks at the quarry. His gaze is dark.{/n} "Everything here must be purged with fire. An... What have you done?"
